name: Timberland Mt Maddsen Mid Leather Waterproof Hiking Boot - Women's
categories: Mt Maddsen Mid Leather Waterproof Hiking Boot
description:
Multi-sport shoes to move faster and more nimbly over varying terrain. A waterproof-breathable layer gets you through wet days, muddy trails, and rain-soaked grass.Uppers are waterproof full-grain leather (from a Leather working group silver-rated tannery) and polyester mesh.Timber-Dry™ waterproof-breathable mebrane is make with 50% recycled plastic.Anti-fatigue removable footbeds.Fuly gusseted tongue keeps out trail debris.Compression-moulded EVA midsole offers lightweight cushioning and shock absorption.Rubber outsoles have deep lugs for solid traction.

        Sustainability
